code: import React from"react";import"./EventItem.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EventItem=_ref=>{let{event,authUserId,onDetail}=_ref;const{_id,title,price,date,creator}=event;const formattedDate=new Date(date).toLocaleDateString();const isEven=authUserId===(creator===null||creator===void 0?void 0:creator._id);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"events-list-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-item-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"event-item-title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"event-item-price",children:["$",price.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"event-item-date",children:["Date: ",formattedDate]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"event-item-action",children:isEven?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"event-owner",children:"You are the owner of this event"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-view-details",onClick:()=>onDetail(_id),children:"View Details"})})]},_id);};export default EventItem;
